titleStmt.title: The coffee scuffle, occasioned by a contest between a learned knight, and a pitifull pedagogue. With the character of a coffee-house.
titleStmt.author: Woolnoth, fl. 1662.

titleStmt.title: The coffee scuffle, occasioned by a contest between a learned knight, and a pitifull pedagogue. With the character of a coffee-house.
titleStmt.author: Woolnoth, fl. 1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold at the Latine Coffee House near the Stocks,

notesStmt.note: "Satirical verses, said to have been made by Woolnoth on Sir J. Langham and Evans, a Schoolmaster"--BM.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Texas, Austin Library.
